item.title: Methods for monitoring artemisinin-based combination therapies efficacy
item.description: Plasmodium falciparum resistance to artemisinin and its derivatives is spreading in South-East Asia, and there is growing concern that this may reach other endemic countries. Methods used to assess P. falciparum resistance to artemisinin-based combination therapies (ACTs) are multiple and often divergent. item.description: Previous research on the breast cancer awareness, attitude and screening practices has produced divergent results. item.title: Desmoid tumours: The aggressive fibromatosis
item.description:
Desmoid tumours are benign tumours that have a tendency to be locally invasive. We present a desmoid tumour of the lower abdominal wall in a 30 year old female patient, discussed the treatment options and reviewed literature of this uncommon lesion.
Key words:Desmoid, abdominal wall, benign tumour.

item.description: In spite of active measles vaccination efforts in 2005 in southern Nigeria, re-emergence continues to occur.
